titleInfo.title: Rugby, Morgan county, Tennessee settlement founded October 5th, 1880

subject.topic: Land settlement -- Tennessee -- Morgan County -- History -- 19th century -- Sources.

subject.topic: Board of Aid to Land Ownership .
Utopian Impulses of the 19th century such as Nashoba, Ruskin, and Rugby .

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: This pamphlet contains an address by Thomas Hughes, president of the founders of Rugby, Tennessee at the time of Rugby`s founding. Hughes details the philosophy and practices of the English colony, as well as prices for goods and services in the settlement. He also describes the area`s environment and resources. Some of this information is included in the pamphlet`s unique glossary.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
